text: Grant Cramer (born November 10, 1961) is an American actor and producer. He was born in Los Angeles, California. His first big role came in the 1984 cult comedy movie Hardbodies, in which he played Scotty Palmer. His other big movie was the 1988 cult classic Killer Klowns from Outer Space. Other movie roles include appearances in Mach 2 (2001) and Follow the Prophet (2009). ==Other websites== * * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Grant Cramer
